Details:
The Oregon Commission on Black Affairs (OCBA) Legislative Committee will hold a meeting at 2:00PM at the Oregon Advocacy Commissions Office.

The meeting is with Diane Schwartz Sykes, Assistant Attorney General, and Aaron Knott, Legislative Liaison, from the Oregon Department of Justice.

The meeting location is accessible to persons with disabilities.  Requests for accommodations for people with disabilities should be made at least 48 hours in advance. Contact Nancy Kramer at nancy.kramer@state.or.us or 503.302.9725 regarding accessibility or any other concerns.
